bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Learning Technology -- Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation for Learning, Education, and Training
IEEE Standard for Learning Technology -- Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation for Learning, Education, and Training

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A conceptual model for interpreting externalized representations of digital aggregations of resources for learning, education, and training is defined. The conceptual model is defined as an ontology. Internal compositions and uses of digital resources are not specified nor are processing methods for resource aggregations.

A conceptual model for interpreting externalized representations of digital aggregations of resources for learning, education, and training is defined. The conceptual model is defined as an ontology. Internal compositions and uses of digital resources are not specified nor are processing methods for resource aggregations.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
